notes: Issue #736 reports that SkiaSharp.Views.Mac namespace is not found when switching a Cocoa project from 'Xamarin.Mac Modern' to 'Xamarin.Mac Full' framework in Visual Studio for Mac. Inspection of SkiaSharp.Views 1.68.0 nupkg confirms the root cause: the package contains lib/Xamarin.Mac20/ (Modern profile) but no lib/Xamarin.Mac45/ (Full profile). When NuGet resolves for Xamarin.Mac Full (which maps to a net45-like TFM), it falls back to lib/net45/ which only contains Desktop/Gtk/WPF views, not Mac views. Reproduction requires Xamarin.Mac SDK (deprecated, not installable on modern systems) and Visual Studio for Mac (discontinued August 2024). The maintainer confirmed this was a NuGet client resolution issue and opened NuGet/NuGet.Client#2572 to fix it. Modern SkiaSharp (v3.x) no longer supports Xamarin.Mac — it uses net8.0-macos via .NET for macOS.

reproductionSteps.description: Inspect SkiaSharp.Views 1.68.0 nupkg to verify TFM contents and confirm the reported namespace resolution issue.
reproductionSteps.output:
lib/MonoAndroid/SkiaSharp.Views.Android.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.dll
lib/tizen40/SkiaSharp.Views.Tizen.dll
lib/uap10.0/SkiaSharp.Views.UWP.dll
lib/Xamarin.iOS/SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll
lib/Xamarin.Mac20/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.dll
lib/Xamarin.TVOS/SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.dll
lib/Xamarin.WatchOS/SkiaSharp.Views.watchOS.dll

reproductionSteps.description: Verify that SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.dll exists ONLY under Xamarin.Mac20 (Modern profile) and NOT under any Full-profile-compatible TFM. The net45/ folder contains Desktop/Gtk/WPF views but no Mac views, confirming NuGet would resolve to wrong assemblies for Xamarin.Mac Full.
reproductionSteps.output:
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.xml
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk.xml
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.dll
lib/net45/SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.xml
lib/Xamarin.Mac20/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.dll
lib/Xamarin.Mac20/SkiaSharp.Views.Mac.xml

reproductionSteps.description: Check if Xamarin.Mac SDK is installed on the current system — required to create a Xamarin.Mac Full project and actually reproduce the namespace resolution failure at build time.
reproductionSteps.command: ls /Library/Frameworks/Xamarin.Mac.framework 2>/dev/null && echo 'Xamarin.Mac found' || echo 'Xamarin.Mac not installed'

reproductionSteps.description: Confirm Visual Studio for Mac availability — required to switch project between 'Xamarin.Mac Modern' and 'Xamarin.Mac Full' framework profiles via IDE GUI.
reproductionSteps.command: ls /Applications/Visual\ Studio.app 2>/dev/null && echo 'VS for Mac found' || echo 'Visual Studio for Mac not installed (discontinued August 2024)'
reproductionSteps.output: Visual Studio for Mac not installed (discontinued August 2024)

versionResults.notes: Package structure confirms the bug (lib/Xamarin.Mac20/ exists but no lib/Xamarin.Mac45/ for Full profile). Cannot run actual build — Xamarin.Mac SDK not available.
Modern SkiaSharp no longer supports Xamarin.Mac. Uses net8.0-macos via .NET for macOS instead. Issue is not applicable to current codebase.

blockers: Requires Xamarin.Mac SDK (deprecated, not installed, no longer installable on modern systems) to create a Xamarin.Mac Full project
Requires Visual Studio for Mac (discontinued August 2024) to switch between Modern and Full framework profiles via IDE
Xamarin.Mac framework is fully superseded by .NET for macOS (net8.0-macos TFM) — the bug is specific to a dead platform
